class.name: gridMapFilters/ThresholdFilter
class.description: Set values below/above a threshold to a specified value.

class.name: gridMapFilters/MinInRadiusFilter
class.description: Compute for each cell of a layer the minimal value inside a radius.

class.name: gridMapFilters/MeanInRadiusFilter
class.description: Compute for each cell of a layer the mean value inside a radius.

class.name: gridMapFilters/NormalVectorsFilter
class.description: Compute the normal vectors of a layer in a map.

class.name: gridMapFilters/CurvatureFilter
class.description: Compute the curvature (second derivative) of a layer in the map.

class.name: gridMapFilters/NormalColorMapFilter
class.description: Compute a new color layer based on normal vectors layers.

class.name: gridMapFilters/LightIntensityFilter
class.description: Compute the diffuse lighting of a surface as new black and white color layer.

class.name: gridMapFilters/MathExpressionFilter
class.description: Parse and evaluate a mathematical matrix expression with layers of a grid map.

class.name: gridMapFilters/SlidingWindowMathExpressionFilter
class.description: Parse and evaluate a mathematical matrix expression within a sliding window on a layer of a grid map.

class.name: gridMapFilters/DuplicationFilter
class.description: Duplicate a layer of a grid map.

class.name: gridMapFilters/DeletionFilter
class.description: Delete layers from a grid map.

class.name: gridMapFilters/ColorMapFilter
class.description: Creates a new color layer with the color mapped between min. and max. value.

class.name: gridMapFilters/SetBasicLayersFilter
class.description: Set specified layers of a grid map as basic layers.

class.name: gridMapFilters/BufferNormalizerFilter
class.description: Normalizes the buffer of a map such that it has default (zero) start index.
